<small>Aramaic form: [[H5103]]</small>
 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָהַר‎</span>] **verb** ==flow, stream== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***run, flow***; perhaps denominative from <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***river***, and this loan-word (compare [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>285</sup>); Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nûru, stream***</u></abbr>, ***river***, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 440</sup>; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַהֲרָא‎</span> ***river***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנָָֽהֲרוּ‎</span> [[Isa.2.2|Isa 2:2]] + 2 t.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנְהֲרוּ‎</span> [[Jer.51.44|Jer 51:44]] — ***flow, stream*** only figurative: of restored Israel streaming <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלדָּֿגָן וגו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלטֿוּב י‎</span> [[Jer.31.12|Jer 31:12]] nations to (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span>) Bel [[Jer.51.44|Jer 51:44]] to temple-hill at Jerusalem [[Isa.2.2|Isa 2:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵלָיו‎</span>) = [[Mic.4.1|Mic 4:1]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלָיו‎</span>). 



 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָהַר‎</span> **verb** ==shine, beam== (Aramaic) (Late Hebrew ***id.***, especially in derivatives; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nûru***</u></abbr>, ***light***, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 440</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***daytime***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***day, daytime***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***shine***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְהַר‎</span> ***id.***; Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נהירא‎</span> ***illustrious***, e.g. [[BDB#Vog|Vog]]<sup>Palm. No. 22</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 2 feminine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנָהַרְתְּ‎</span> [[Isa.60.5|Isa 60:5]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָהָ֑רוּ‎</span> [[Ps.34.6|Ps 34:6]] — ***beam, be radiant***, figurative of joy: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּרְאִי וְנ‎</span> [[Isa.60.5|Isa 60:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִבִּיטוּ אֵלָיו וְנ‎</span> [[Ps.34.6|Ps 34:6]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַבּ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּנְהָרוּ‎</span>, see [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]).
